lead_paragraph: Broncos coach Gary Kubiak informed his players after their victory over Oakland on Sunday that he's stepping away from the game and the team he loves. He said the grind of coaching was taking too big of a toll on his health.
snippet: Broncos coach Gary Kubiak informed his players after their victory over Oakland on Sunday that he's stepping away from the game and the team he loves. He said the grind of coaching was taking too big of a toll on his health....

headline.main: Kubiak Tells Broncos He's Leaving for Health Reasons
headline.print_headline: Kubiak Tells Broncos He's Leaving for Health Reasons
